snippet.title: Arma 3 Creator DLC: Western Sahara Trailer
snippet.description:
The first milestone on the road to Arma 4 is here. 
Get #ArmaReforger now ➡ https://reforger.armaplatform.com/buygame

Become a private military contractor and be deployed to the desert dunes of Sefrou-Ramal. The Arma 3 Creator DLC: Western Sahara is OUT NOW: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1681170/Arma_3_Creator_DLC_Western_Sahara/

Key features:

✔ 100 km2 terrain
✔ Armed forces (ION Services, SFIA, Tura, UNA, NATO Desert)
✔ 5 weapons, 9 vehicle variants & new equipment
✔ 3 MP scenarios & 1 SP showcase
✔ Various additional content

Buy Arma 3 Creator DLC: Western Sahara on Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1681170/Arma_3_Creator_DLC_Western_Sahara/

About Creator DLC
Western Sahara is released as an Arma 3 Creator DLC, which means it's made by a third-party developer (Rotators Collective) and published by Bohemia Interactive. To learn more about this initiative, please visit https://arma3.com/dlc/creator.

About Arma 3
Experience true combat gameplay in a massive military sandbox. Authentic, diverse, open – Arma 3 sends you to war.

Check out our official store ➡ https://store.bistudio.com/

Facebook - http://www.facebook.com/ArmaPlatform​
Twitter - http://twitter.com/ArmaPlatform
YouTube - http://youtube.com/ArmaPlatform
Discord - https://discord.com/invite/arma 
Steam - http://steamcommunity.com/app/107410

About Rotators Collective
Rotators Collective is a small group of likeminded developers loosely assembled around Europe with over 10 years of experience in making mods for a wide variety of games, including the top-rated Arma 3 mini-campaigns Callsign Minotaur and Dunes. The Western Sahara DLC has been specifically designed to expand on Arma 3's 2035 near-future setting.

Trailer Credits
Footage, editing, and music by Rotators Collective.

#Arma3 #DLC
